name: Yellow Jackets demo
description:
This  game isn't optimised for web, for a better experience try the downloadable version.

Created by a group of students on the Bsc Creative Computing students from Bath Spa University. Please stay tuned for further updates and our eventual full release here on Itch!!

You can also follow development here:

 https://twitter.com/_YellowJackets_

https://www.tiktok.com/@yellowjackets_bsu 

https://www.reddit.com/r/Yellow_Jackets_Game/

Controls

  • LMB - fire weapon
  • Mouse - pitch and yaw
  • Q,E - roll
  • W - boost
  • F - rear view
  • RMB - hover/aim mode
  • P - pause game
  • TAB - Unlock cursor (for shop buttons)
  • fly into items to buy them

In hover mode

  • WASD - strafe
  • Q,E - roll
  • Space, CTRL - vertical movement

Settings - changing sensitivity

  • U,J - Y sensitivity
  • I,K - X sensitivity
  • O,L - Roll sensitivity
